org.firewaterframework.mappers.validation
Class MapPropertyEditor

java.lang.Object
  java.beans.PropertyEditorSupport
      org.firewaterframework.mappers.validation.MapPropertyEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyEditor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Pattern, SQLLiteral, SQLLiteralList, SQLNumber, SQLString
public abstract class MapPropertyEditor
extends java.beans.PropertyEditorSupport

This is a PropertyEditor that supports a simple copy mechanism. This is the base class of Firewater's validation scheme. It is important because the framework is inherintly susceptible to SQL injection attacks, as it is totally possible have string passed in from the web layer be copied directly into SQL queries. This class and it's subclasses represent the line of defense against attacks like this, plus giving a mechanism for transforming incoming Request data in a number of ways.

See Also:
DataBinder
